title: hanta jnyAnendu
sahitya:
hanta jnyAnendu ceyvu matpriya sakhiyalla vihavunnE


anupallavi

  kindu kOpa kAraNam kiLimoLi dayitanu


caraNam 1    oru nAL nishi mAnini sarasa kAma kELiyil varanonnATa haha "bhavAn" ennu kathikkayAl nirupamAngi lajjAdara hAsavu marnna mAm paramayi ramippicca taruNam innu marannO
    caraNam 2    phaNi rAja shayanam shrI padhmanAbha nODayE kSaNa kAlavum vaikAte sakhimE colka nI tApam praNata khEda hAriyAm prANa nAyakanallA taNimati mukhi param Arinnu sharaNammE
